articles.title: DJI said Mavic 4 Pro wouldn’t launch in US but these stores are selling it anyhow - The Verge
articles.description: Apparently DJI isn’t entirely skipping the United States, as its Mavic 4 Pro went on sale at Adorama and possibly B&H.

articles.title: Microsoft shares its process (and discarded ideas) for redone Windows 11 Start menu - Ars Technica
articles.description: Updated Start menu design is currently being tested in Windows Insider previews.

articles.title: Google just dropped a new Android 16 beta, but it's not the one you're waiting for - Android Police
articles.description: Android 16 Beta 4.1 brings fixes, not Material 3 Expressive

articles.title: Google is testing AI search on its homepage - CNBC
articles.description: Since the launch of ChatGPT in November 2022, Alphabet investors have been concerned that OpenAI could take market share from Google in search.

articles.title: Google Pixel 9a gets stern "do not buy" warning as teardown reveals questionable design - Notebookcheck
articles.description: Despite the Google Pixel 9a performing admirably in his durability tests, JerryRigEverything has officially recommended against buying the mid-range smartphone because of Google's anti-repair design.

articles.title: Google announces Material 3 Expressive, a colorful evolution of Android design - Ars Technica
articles.description: Google’s take on Android is getting brighter and bolder later this year.
